attributes.action: Do something about music from nabours
attributes.additional_details: I live next door to a rented property and the last two tenants have been a nightmare we have had close to five years of stress and problems
attributes.background: Pass a law against having to suffer loud music from neighbour's

rejection.details:
Certain types of noise are already against the law. Councils must look into complaints about noise that could be a ‘statutory nuisance’ (covered by the Environmental Protection Act 1990): https://www.gov.uk/guidance/noise-nuisances-how-councils-deal-with-complaints

You can report a noise complaint here: https://www.gov.uk/report-noise-pollution-to-council
